excerpt: The TMCM-1210 is a single axis stepper motor controller/driver module with sensorless load dependent current control. The device is powered by Trinamic StallGuard2™, CoolStep™, SpreadCycle™ chopper and StealthChop™ technology and has a SixPoint™ ramp generator. The TMCM-1210 is capable of driving up to 0.7A (RMS) of current per phase (with proper heatsinking). It is designed for an operating voltage of 7...30V. The device provides a RS485 interface. An integrated protocol processor supplies a high level TMCL communication.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.More about the TMCL-IDESpecial FeaturesCoolStep™SpreadCycle™StallGuard2™StealthChop™
